document_data.name: Diloontier's Apothecary
document_data.mainbody: '''Diloontier's Apothecary''' was located in the heart of the [[Castle Ward of Waterdeep|Castle Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]] around [[1364 DR]].
document_data.Staff:
[[File:Drag259-p63-jerome.png|thumb|right|270px|''Jerome at work making perfume.'']]
The shop was owned and run by [[Jerome Diloontier]].
document_data.Goods & Services: This store specialized in [[herb]]al and magical balms, [[potion]]s, and [[perfume]]s.
document_data.Patronage: This upscale store catered to the elite of Waterdhavian society. Those who had the right credentials and money for it could quietly purchase [[poison]]s and more nefarious potions from the proprietor.
